title: Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses
description: These days, you have many choices regarding places to purchase glasses. A growingly popular method is through online retailers. That said, you may be reluctant to get glasses. However, experiencing certain symptoms may leave you with no other choice.  The post Signs Suggesting That You Might Need Glasses appeared first on AV Club.

title: Julia: The Forgotten Trailblazer That Changed TV Forever
description: Before trailblazers like The Cosby Show, there was Julia -- the groundbreaking sitcom that changed TV forever by centering a professional, middle-class Black woman in 1968. The post Julia: The Forgotten Trailblazer That Changed TV Forever appeared first on TV Fanatic.
author: Lisa Babick

title: The Sticky Premiere: Margo Martindale Talks ‘Desperation’ and Hatred That Jump-Starts One Wild Maple Syrup Heist
description: Hundreds of millions of dollars worth of maple syrup. A vindictive bureaucrat. One pissed off farmer. It may not sound like the high-stakes elements of an action-packed and lucrative heist, but that’s what makes The Sticky so appealing… and funny. title: Mr. & Mrs. Smith Adds Anora Breakout in First Season 2 Casting
description: Mr. & Mrs. Smith is welcoming a new spy to its cast. Anora breakout Mark Eydelshteyn has joined the cast of Prime Video’s spy dramedy for its upcoming Season 2, according to our sister site Variety.
